revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Tin Tower |image = [[File:Tin Tower.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Tin Tower. |tokens = 4,500 |location = Northeast of Ecruteak City. }} '''Tin Tower''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 88,500 HP.
== Tables des rencontres == === Rencontres sauvages ===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata || colspan=2 rowspan=2|
N/A |- | [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly |- |}

380,000 || colspan=3 rowspan=3|
N/A |- | [[File:Haunter.png|40px]] Haunter |- | [[File:Ho-Oh.png|40px]] '''Ho-Oh*''' ||
1,410,000 |} '''Note: Must have captured Suicune, Raikou, and Entei'''

===Table du taux d'obtention avec Perte de bonus===
After Reaching Unova, the drop chance for items in Johto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- ! Chest Item !!
